game.name: The Fire of Fenix
game.description:
The real Fenix is here to challenge you! Would you like to accept this challenge and clear all his enemies from the sky? Join The Fire of Fenix and be prepared to guide him to kill the dangerous flying dinosaurs! It is not going to be easy at all you will spot the sky full of enemies when you click the play button. The number of his enemies will keep increasing as you progress in the game. More enemies you will kill the higher score you will hit on the board.

Apart from a horde of deadly enemies, you would also see the fire balls that will cause lose your energy if you touch them a bit in this brand new adventure game. Do not forget to grab the coins to get your final score boosted. Try to keep your character away from all of the obstacles that you see in the sky and shoot his enemies with fire! Find a safe place for your character for his long survival in this HTML5 flying game.

This cool shooting challenge features simple graphics, easy-to-understand controls, and seamless graphics. The best is that it is playable on multiple devices without download and meant for players from different age groups. Track your final score by looking at the top middle portion of the screen, while the bottom area of the screen will show your power bar in this single-player shooter challenge! Try out other free shooting games to provide you with the best quality fun and entertainment!
